channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+2479] Google Streetview at its best
[+1867] Tea Partiers Mock And Scorn Apparent Parkinson's Victim
[+1758] 10 Ways Women Turn Men Off
item.description: Find out which female habits drive guys crazy -- and not in a good way.

item.title: [+1596] White Death: the Sniper Who Killed 700 Soviets in 100 Days
item.description: Ensconced in the snow, his all-white camouflage suit rendering him invisible to the invading Soviet soldiers he stalked, Simo Häyhä steadied himself to fire. During the 1939–1940 Winter War, the Finnish sniper undertook a killing spree that saw him single-handedly take the lives of at least 700 men in less than 100 days.

item.title: [+1234] Revealed: Bush warned 9/11 Commission about 'crossing line'
item.description: Senior Bush administration officials sternly cautioned the 9/11 Commission against probing too deeply into the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001, according to a document recently obtained by the ACLU.

item.title: [+1160] Tiger's Sext Messages to Porn Star Joslyn James
item.description: Well these are predictably gross: "Next time i see you, you better beg and if you don't do it right i will slap, spank, bite and f*ck you till mercy.." etc. Best one..."Have you ever had a golden shower done to you"

item.title: [+999] One Lie...(COMIC)
[+957] The Calvin & Hobbes That Always Cheers Me Up
[+951] Photos of 15-Year-Old Angelina Jolie Up for Auction (PICS)
item.description: In the photos, Angelina is wearing a bikini, on all fours, and has wet hair! Other photos of Angie are headshots, but the two very racy ones, taken in black and white, are up for auction, with bidding starting at $400-$600.

item.title: [+827] WARNING: Do NOT Open Password Reset Email From Facebook
item.description: There’s an email going round asking Facebook users to reset their password. The email is a fake and contains a virus, do not open or follow any of its instructions.

item.title: [+819] Awesome Guy Makes Awesome Entrance
item.description: Guy walks through door. Guy sees rail. Guy bypasses rail.

item.title: [+762] 'Jedi' believer who refused to remove hood gets an apology!
item.description: Chris Jarvis is a member of the International Church of Jediism - based on the famous Star Wars films - whose doctrine states followers can wear hoods.

item.title: [+739] I Like My Women Like My Coffee (PIC)
[+711] Ladies Excuses for Being Single (CHART)
[+656] If I hold real still....maybe?:) ---->or maybe not :( (Pic)
[+640] Bernie Madoff Beaten in Prison
item.description: The jailed financier was assaulted by another inmate in December, according to three people familiar with the matter.

item.title: [+586] Apple Banning Screen Protectors in Retail Stores?
item.description: iLounge and Macworld are reporting that Apple has banned the sale of film-based screen protectors for its iPhone, iPod, and Mac lines in its retail stores. But why?

item.title: [+585] And so it begins...Walgreens: no new Medicaid patients Apr16
item.description: Effective April 16, Walgreens drugstores across the state won't take any new Medicaid patients, saying that filling their prescriptions is a money-losing proposition — the latest development in an ongoing dispute over Medicaid reimbursement.

item.title: [+555] Tampon-makers can't mention the V-word. Period.
item.description: For years, advertising for tampons and "sanitary products" have been shrouded in nebulous euphemism. So what happens when a US tampon-maker drops the coy messaging and goes straight for the jugular (so to speak)? Its ad gets banned by the major US television networks for mentioning the word vagina.

item.title: [+530] Panda Master Escape Plan (Video)
item.description: You distract the guardsman - we will take the backdoor!
